statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_id, owner_id, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_value, owner_id FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY owner_id ASC;
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT MAX(key_value) FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(key_value)) FROM encryption_keys WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) FROM encryption_keys GROUP BY owner_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT message_id, encrypted_message FROM secure_communication ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys INNER JOIN secure_communication ON encryption_keys.key_id = secure_communication.sender_id ORDER BY created_at ASC;
